onTimeArrival.body: Your room is ready for you. Enjoy your stay and let us know if you need anything

earlyArrival.body: Your room is not quite ready for you. But please enjoy the sights

earlyArrival: Howdy there Desperado. Your a little early but why don't you come to your senses and take in the beautiful Santa Barbara sights and sounds while we finish getting your room ready for you.
onTimeArrival: Welcome! Your room is ready for you. Take it easy NEEDS WORK
lateArrival: Welcome to the Hotel California. You can checkout any time you like. Only thing is, YOU CAN NEVER LEAVE!
